dataList.content: Episode S0_8
We’re here. Charon knew the way all along.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: No, no you didn’t! Sinclair and I were next to you the whole time pointing you in the right direction.
I'm just glad you've finally learned how to tell southeast from northeast now, Charon.
<So this is... the old L Corp.?>
This is my first time seeing it for myself, too... It can't have been long since "that" happened.
My goodness... How does a building get this run-down?
Hah! So the posh lad can't even handle seeing a grotty place, huh?
Cut the chatter. Off the bus, now.
<Huh, there are people over there...>
They’re Fixers from the same Office as Miss Yuri.
They are experienced explorers who have delved through the branch facilities of L Corp. a number of times.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: An introduction, then. The person on the left is Hopkins, and the one on the right is Aya.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Hello~

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Th... The... The—

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: The Red Gaze! It’s—it’s such an honor to meet you...! I’ve heard so many stories of your deeds. To see you in person, it's...

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Ah.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: See the shabby warehouse there? That’s where the stairs leading down to the branch facility are.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: From there on, Yuri will be your guide.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: ... Yeah.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: These Fixers aren't rookies, either... Count on them to deal with any complications.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: That should be enough, yeah? This is as far as I can accompany you. I’ll be waiting back at the bus.
<Huh? Wait, what?>

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: You’re sorely mistaken if you expect me to babysit you forever, Dante.
You sayin' you’re gonna take a back seat while we do all the work?

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: If I get myself involved, the expedition would be a little too free of challenge, wouldn’t it? It’d turn into a happy little tour.
... In other words, you want us to come back red, black, and blue.
That’s the sort of thing people say when they're hiding something...

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Think as you like.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: I got you guides and all—now go make it count.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Yes! I certainly won’t disappoint you, Mister Red Gaze!

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I’ll try my best, I suppose~
